description: This is hands down the best pineapple salsa recipe! It is absolutely delicious plus there's a bonus creamy sauce you can make with the leftover juices!
name: The Best Pineapple Salsa Recipe
recipeIngredient: 2 cups pineapple (, chopped into large pieces)
1/2 cup coarsely chopped red onion (, about 1/4 of a medium onion)
1 tablespoon chopped Serrano pepper (, about 1/2 a pepper (seeds removed)
1/2 tablespoon chopped garlic (, 2-3 cloves, roughly chopped)
1/2 -1 cup juice from salsa (, see instructions)
Veggie broth or pineapple juice to make up the rest of the 1 cup juice (, see note)

recipeInstructions.text: Put pineapple, red pepper, onion, cilantro, Serrano pepper, lemon juice, apple cider vinegar, garlic, and salt in a food processor. Pulse until chopped.
Drain the salsa with sieve and save the juice if making cream sauce.
Use in tacos, as a dip, in wraps, over nachos or simply devour with a spoon!
